rules.description: Displays the time and date when the Account Health pick list was last updated.

rules.formula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName="US Organization", NOT( ISBLANK( Duplicate_Account__c ) ) )

rules.description: Sends out an email notification when a new US Organization is created

Updates the Territory & Specialist field with the corresponding State when Account record is created.

rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND (2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9 OR 10 OR 11 OR 12 OR 13 OR 14 OR 15 OR 16 OR 17)
rules.description: Updates the Territory & Specialist field with the corresponding State when Account record is created.

rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND (2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9 OR 10 OR 11 OR 12 OR 13 OR 14 OR 15 OR 16 OR 17 OR 18 OR 19 OR 20 OR 21 OR 22)
rules.description: Updates the Territory & Specialist field with the corresponding State when Account record is created.

rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND (2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9 OR 10 OR 11 OR 12 OR 13 OR 14)
rules.description: Updates the Territory & Specialist field with the corresponding State when Account record is created.
Send Cancellation email and resets the Enddate to today's date if Mozo Trial Status is set to "Former" from Current. (415)
Sends out various Email Alerts notifying the customer of pending expiration of their Mozo Free Trial (416)
Sends A Welcome Email when a user starts a Mozo Free Trial (417)

rules.fullName: Mozo Free Trial Welcome To Full
rules.description: Fires as soon as a customer selects a Mozo level between M1 - M4 and ends their Mozo Free Trial (419)
rules.formula: AND (ISCHANGED(MOZO_Level__c) && ISPICKVAL( Mozo_Trial_Status__c , 'Current')) && ISPICKVAL(Registration_Level__c,'R1') && (ISPICKVAL( MOZO_Level__c,'M4') || ISPICKVAL( MOZO_Level__c,'M3') || ISPICKVAL( MOZO_Level__c,'M2') ||ISPICKVAL( MOZO_Level__c,'M1') )

rules.description: Update Type to Homeschool - Co-op
Update Type to Homeschool - Multi-family
Update Type to Homeschool - Single-family
Creates a task assigned to Charlotte when a new Canada church is made added/renewed and is not RCCG
Creates a task assigned to Rebekah when a new Canada church is made added/renewed and is RCCG
Remove after 3/31/2018
rules.formula: AND (($RecordType.Name = "US Organization") && ISPICKVAL( Primary_Ethnic_Group__c ,"Hispanic"),ISPICKVAL( Status__c , "Added"),(ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE( Status__c ) , "Prospect" )|| ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE( Status__c ), "Ready to Activate")))

rules.fullName: Notify Jen when Canada church is changed to International

rules.description: Used for International Churches - When the Status is Dropped, write current date to Registration Date

rules.fullName: Send Notification Email When Account Health Is Updated
rules.description: Sends an email to Account Owners whenever someone changes the Account Health field.
rules.formula: AND (ISChanged(Account_Health__c), NOT ISPICKVAL(Account_Health__c,'None'), $RecordType.Name ='US Organization',ISPICKVAL(Type,'Church'), LastModifiedById <> OwnerId)

rules.fullName: Send notifications when Account health changes to Red
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL(Account_Health__c , "Problems: Don't Know How To Fix") && NOT ISPICKVAL(Registration_Status__c, "Dropped")

rules.description: Any field that is synced with Intacct is changed.
rules.formula: ISCHANGED( Name ) || ISCHANGED( BillingStreet ) || ISCHANGED( BillingCity ) || ISCHANGED(BillingState) || ISCHANGED(BillingPostalCode) || ISCHANGED(BillingCountry) || ISCHANGED(ShippingStreet) || ISCHANGED(ShippingCity) || ISCHANGED(ShippingState) || ISCHANGED(ShippingPostalCode) || ISCHANGED(ShippingCountry) || ISCHANGED( Fax ) || ISCHANGED( Phone ) || ISCHANGED( Website ) || ISCHANGED( Customer_Type__c ) || ISCHANGED( Default_Terms__c ) || ISCHANGED( Delivery_Options__c )

rules.fullName: TR - Update Reg Level to R0 for New Accounts
rules.description: When a US Organization Account is created, update registration level to R0

rules.fullName: TR - Update Reg Stat to Dropped
rules.description: Update Registration Level to R0 when Registration Status is Dropped
rules.formula: AND(ISCHANGED( Registration_Status__c ), RecordType.Name ="US Organization", ISPICKVAL( Registration_Status__c , 'Dropped'))

rules.fullName: TR - Update Reg Status to Dropped
rules.description: When Account Status is changed from Added to Dropped, Registration Status is updated to Dropped
Updates Most Recent Date Added when Registration Status is changed to New or Reinstated
used to update registration date for invoiced registrations
